QuestData.Title: The Battle for Shattrath
QuestData.Description:
To stop the Iron Horde, we must overcome prejudice and work together, if only for this purpose.
Horde, Alliance, past, present... all meaningless in the face of this enemy.
We will retake Shattrath together... or die trying.
QuestData.LogDescription: Repel the Iron Horde from Shattrath.
QuestData.RewardText: I cannot believe Orgrim is truly dead. Blackhand has carved a hole in my heart, and I intend to destroy him when the opportunity presents itself.
